snippet.title: Anterris Alpha Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Anterris is a creature-collecting action RPG in active development. 

Explore the open world and collect creatures called Antera. Take control of your Antera in fast-paced battles, build your homestead, and join friends in dungeons and raids.

Wishlist Anterris on Steam and check out the demo!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2657580
